TopicTitle: Kerbal on EVA gets reported as "Vessel has no fuel"

Articles.Content:
Windows 11, Ryzen 9 5900HX, 16GB, RTX3070, KSP2 v0.1.0.0.20892

As above... frequently when a Kerbal EVA's you get a notification that "The vessel has no fuel and cannot manoeuvre.
I've noticed that one too - but once you turn on RCS you can fly around just fine.
